tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE content_performance (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id UUID,
    views INT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT
)

CREATE TABLE comments (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE content_performance (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
content_id INT,
views INT,
likes INT,
comments INT);
